EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- Standard Template - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear Alvin, Thank you for the response below, its good to hear from you. I am not able to connect via Skype but I am available by phone. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. You can watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. You can learn more about how MBO works by clicking here <http://www.mbopartners.com/how-mbo-works>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: omoniyi kuti [mailto:xomoniyi@yahoo.com <mailto:xomoniyi@yahoo.com>] Sent: Friday, November 22, 2013 2:54 PM To: MBO Communications Subject: Re: alvin, MBO can answer your consulting questions Hi Sara I would be interested in finding out a bit more, can you let me know if we could speak about it via skype. Thanks Alvin On , omoniyi kuti <xomoniyi@yahoo.com <mailto:xomoniyi@yahoo.com>> wrote:Hi Sara I am On Friday, November 22, 2013 3:21 PM, Sara Conde <info@mbopartners.com <mailto:info@mbopartners.com>> wrote:alvin,Working independently means the freedom to make your own career decisions - and having a guide to help you along the way can make a big difference.In my experience, consultants that are committed to learning more every day tend to be successful. MBO provides independents with resources covering every facet of owning your own solo business. To learn more, check out this story <http://link.mbopartners.com/688NPM52500005x007rmc00> about a self-employed professional who used MBO's educational resources to launch his practice.Have any questions about being self-employed? Just email me to discover how MBO can help prepare you for success as an independent consultant. ___________________________________ Sara Conde Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://link.mbopartners.com/688NPM52500005y007rmc00> If you wish to update your email preferences, click on the following link: Subscription Management <http://link.mbopartners.com/u/688NPM52500005z007rmc00>
